request.description:
This method creates a new A/B rotator.

Please note that these fields are mandatory in your request body:
1.RotatorId (user generated UUID)
2.CampaignId

If you are adding member please specify:
1. MemberId (user generated UUID)
2. BannerId (Member Ad UUID)
3. abGroup settings (A or B)

This method retrieves A/B rotator by UUID.

You need to parse UUID on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000
(00000 - Rotator UUID)

This method deletes A/B rotator.

Banner uuid is required on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000
(00000 - Rotator UUID)

This method renames A/B banner.

Rotator UUID is required on you request URL.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Title
(00000 - Banner uuid)

This method deletes A/B rotator backup.

Rotator UUID is required on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/BackupBanner
(00000 - Rotator UUID)

This method sets A/B rotator backup.

Rotator UUID is required on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/BackupBanner
(00000 - Rotator UUID)

Backup banner UUID is required in your request body.

This method activates A/B rotator.

You need to parse Rotator UUID on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Activate
(00000 - Rotator UUID)

This method deactivates A/B rotator.

You need to parse Rotator UUID on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Deactivate
(00000 - Rotator UUID)

This method updates A/B rotator members.

Rotator UUID is required on you request URL.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Members
(00000 - Banner uuid)

For each rotator member please specify:
1. MemberId (user generated UUID)
2. BannerId (Member Ad UUID)
3. abGroup settings (A or B)

This method sets sequence to members of A/B rotator.

Rotator UUID is required on you request URL.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Members/Sequence
(00000 - Banner uuid)

This method sets settings to members of A/B rotator.

Rotator UUID is required on you request URL.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Members/11111/Settings
(00000 - Banner UUID, 11111 - Member UUID)

This method adds a member to A/B rotator.

Rotator UUID and rotator member UUID is required on you request URL.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Members/11111/Banner
(00000 - Banner UUID, 11111 - Member UUID)

This method deletes A/B rotator backup.

Rotator UUID and rotator member UUID is required on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/ABRotators/00000/Members/11111
(00000 - Rotator UUID, 11111 - Member UUID)

item.name: Set Banner as Sequential Rotator member

request.description:
This method adds a member to sequential rotator.

Rotator UUID and rotator member UUID is required on you request URL.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/SequentialRotators/00000/Members/11111/Banner
(00000 - Banner UUID, 11111 - Member UUID)

This method deletes sequential rotator backup.

Rotator UUID and rotator member UUID is required on your request url.

EXAMPLE: /v1/rotators/SequentialRotators/00000/Members/11111
(00000 - Rotator UUID, 11111 - Member UUID)
